data.keep_track_of_the_number_of_words_you_wr: Keep track of the number of words you write each day using the activity button.
data.what_is_word_counter_text1: Apart from counting words and characters, our online editor can help you to improve word choice and writing style, and, optionally, help you to detect grammar mistakes and plagiarism. To check word count, simply place your cursor into the text box above and start typing. You'll see the number of characters and words increase or decrease as you type, delete, and edit them. You can also copy and paste text from another program over into the online editor above. The Auto-Save feature will make sure you won't lose any changes while editing, even if you leave the site and come back later. Tip: Bookmark this page now.
data.what_is_word_counter_text2: Knowing the word count of a text can be important. For example, if an author has to write a minimum or maximum amount of words for an article, essay, report, story, book, paper, you name it. WordCounter will help to make sure its word count reaches a specific requirement or stays within a  certain limit.
data.what_is_word_counter_text3: In addition, WordCounter shows you the top 10 keywords and keyword density of the article you're writing. This allows you to know which keywords you use how often and at what percentages. This can prevent you from over-using certain words or word combinations and check for best distribution of keywords in your writing.
data.what_is_word_counter_text4: In the Details overview you can see the average speaking and reading time for your text, while Reading Level is an indicator of the education level a person would need in order to understand the words youâ€™re using.
data.what_is_word_counter_text5: Disclaimer: We strive to make our tools as accurate as possible but we cannot guarantee it will always be so.
data.clean_text_modal_text: This button helps you clean up your document by removing funky characters, unneeded new lines, etc.
data.microsoft_word_document_fix_remove_inval: Microsoft Word Document Fix (Remove invalid characters)
data.sign_in_modal_text1: When you sign in to WordCounter you get access to some awesome features.
data.sign_in_modal_text2: We'll save whatever you're working on automatically and even store multiple versions so you can access it in case your browser crashes or you accidentally close your browser.
data.sign_in_modal_text3: Setup writing goals you want to work toward and even embed them in your blog or website.
data.sign_in_modals_text4: Enable unlimited checks for plagiarism and writing issues. Connects seamlessly with your free WordCounter account.

data.details_tab_text: You can turn on or off different counting options here.

data.buttons_tab_text: You can turn on or off different buttons provided for different functionalities.
data.activity_btn_text: Keeps track of your word and character count.
data.auto_save_btn_text: When turned on, WordCounter will automatically save your document every 30 seconds. You can then switch back to previous versions of your document at any time.
data.case_btn_text: Gives different case options. Applies to your entire document or only the text you select.
data.clean_text_btn_text: After pasting a document into WordCounter, this will clean it up by removing invalid characters, word wrapping issues and unneeded new lines.
data.clear_btn_text: Delete all of the text in your document.
data.download_btn_text: Download your written text (PDF, TXT, DOC) to your device.
data.find_and_replace_btn_text: Find and replace any words or sentences you want.
data.goal_btn_text: Set writing goals (such as 500 words) and WordCounter will let you know when you've reached them. You can also share and embed your goals.
data.print_btn_text: Print your document quickly and easily.
data.proof_read_btn_text: WordCounter reads your document back to you. Make sure to turn up your volume!
data.redo_btn_text: Redo your last changes. Click multiple times to redo multiple changes.
data.save_btn_text: Saves your text for later retrieval. Be sure and click the SAVE button each time you want to save.
data.save_to_drive_btn_text: Saves your document to Google Drive. Great for backup purposes.
data.speed_btn_text: Use a timer to see how fast you're typing.
data.spell_btn_text: A powerful spelling and grammar checker for your document.
data.talk_to_type_btn_text: Speak into your microphone and WordCounter will type for you.
data.thesaurus_btn_text: Select (with your mouse) a word in your document and click the thesaurus button to get a list of synonyms.
data.undo_btn_text: Undo your last changes. Click multiple times to undo multiple changes.
data.upload_btn_text: Upload your existing document (PDF, TXT, DOC, DOCX, ODT) into WordCounter.
data.new_goal_text: Enter the number of characters, words, sentences or paragraphs you want to set for a goal.

data.embed_goal_modal_text: Here you can build your very own goal progress bar that you can put on your website, blog or in your signature on other websites. Choose a size and color, then click Save. Finally, click the View Code button to get your code.
